title: Before Winter Comes, E&C GOP Ask Sec. Granholm for DOE’s Plan to Help Americans Afford Unaffordable Energy Costs
description: Washington, D.C. — House Energy and Commerce Committee Republicans sent a letter to Secretary of Energy Jennifer Granholm on Thursday asking how the Department of Energy (DOE) was addressing rising energy costs and possible supply disruptions.

title: Hearing on “Investing in American Jobs: Legislation to Strengthen Manufacturing and Competitiveness”
Leader Rodgers: “Democrats’ Tax and Spending Spree Hurts the Economy and Makes us More Dependent on China”
description: Washington, D.C.—Today, House Energy and Commerce Republican Leader Cathy McMorris Rodgers (R-WA) delivered remarks urging Democrats and the Biden-Harris Administration to focus on supply chain solutions that strengthen the American economy, rather than their reckless tax and spending that is raising costs on families and workers.

title: Bilirakis Opening Statement in CPAC Legislative Hearing
description: Washington, D.C.—Today, House Energy and Commerce Committee Republican Leader for Consumer Protection and Commerce Gus Bilirakis (R-FL) delivered remarks on securing American supply chains.
